mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(username, password, role_id, email, phone, create_time, name, address, status) VALUES (#{username},#{password},#{roleId}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{createTime}, #{name}, #{address}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, password, role_id, email, phone, create_time, name, address, status FROM user where username = #{username}
SELECT user_id, username, password, role_id, email, phone, create_time, name, address, status FROM user where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password}, role_id = #{roleId}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, create_time = #{createTime}, name = #{name}, address = #{address}, status = #{status} where username = #{username}
